price: ߏ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߏ߫ ( ߊ߬ ߢߊ ߞߊ߲߬ )߸ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߦߴߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߗߐ߫ ߦߏ߫ ߡߎ߰ߡߎ߰ߣߍ߲
arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illā jaʿalathu kal-ramīmi
